actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to promote the development of methods of research, experimentation, and testing that minimize the use of, and pain and suffering to, live animals.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to make grants for research and development of new methods of research, experimentation, and testing which minimize the use of and the pain inflicted upon, live animals. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to promote the development of methods of research, experimentation, and testing that minimize the use of, and pain and suffering to, live animals.
